short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension to make easier copy cookies value.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to facilitate copying the value of cookies. This extension makes it easy to copy the value of a cookie in the browser, allowing you to enter and store the name of the cookie that will have its value copied to the clipboard. After saving the cookie name, you can select the extension option from the context menu, and get the saved cookie value directly to the clipboard.
